body: I never took these seriously before but hey ask me some questions you want to know answers to. Be serious if possible!!
body_tagged: I never took these seriously before but hey ask me some questions you want to know answers to. Be serious if possible!!
title: Ask me anything.

replies.body:

replies.body: Opinions?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions?

replies.body:
1 - Youre kinda cool I guess, never really talked to you but whenever you came into our channel before/after tourney matches you were chill. 
2 - In tourney 2, the underbridge! and I didnt really play much in T3 but it was the final match, we didnt really take it seriously but we still won, we played to have fun and meme and we still end up winninng which just makes it all the much better.
3 - GrapeSmoothie
4 - nothing much man, how about you?

replies.body:
1 - hello nathan.guy19
2 - Lol memes and my good friend SheenyK asked me to.
3 - Favourite match is the match from tourney 2 against cacalmarin where i got in the wool last minute and said the champ is here the match was the definiton of memes.
4- damnnn bro, we got hella close on ppb just memeing by ourselves on hypixel and ill never forget that, I could always talk to you about anything and you always went along with memes. You accepted my toxicity and kinda made me less toxic and i will forever be thankful my brother !! <33333

replies.body:
As a player, I dont respect you, You blatantly cheated. 
As a person, youre really chill and a nice guy to speak to :)

Favourite tourney match on ocn would be hard to say, everything was so fun. Any game with either SMM or Ninja Squad.

Favourite match is the match from tourney 2 against cacalmarin where i got in the wool last minute and said the champ is here the match was the definiton of memes
